headline: UFC Parent TKO Punches Higher, Leads S&P 500; Intel Extends Gains Late On Trump Reversal
summary: UFC parent TKO Group and Micron were among Monday's top S&P 500 performers. Intel added to gains late as Trump reversed course on CEO Tan.

content.title: UFC Parent TKO Punches Higher, Leads S&P 500; Intel Extends Gains Late On Trump Reversal

headline: Albemarle operating chief Netha Johnson to leave company
summary: Albemarle, the world's largest producer of lithium for rechargeable batteries, said on Monday that Chief Operating Officer Netha Johnson will leave the company. Albemarle did not provide a timeline for Johnson's exit. A company spokesperson declined to comment on the reason for his departure.

content.title: Albemarle operating chief Netha Johnson to leave company
content.summary: Albemarle, the world's largest producer of lithium for rechargeable batteries, said on Monday that Chief Operating Officer Netha Johnson will leave the company. Albemarle did not provide a timeline for Johnson's exit. A company spokesperson declined to comment on the reason for his departure.

headline: Lithium Stocks Are Soaring. Why Albemarle, Others Are Hot.
summary: Lithium stocks rose early Monday after Chinese battery maker  Contemporary Amperex Technology  Ltd. halted production at one of its mines due to licensing issues.  Shares of  Albemarle  and  Sociedad Quimica y Minera De Chile  or SQM, rose 7% and 8.7%, respectively, while the  and  dropped a out 0.3% and 0.5%, respectively.  Shares of Chinaâ€™s  Ganfeng Lithium  rose 10% in overseas trading.

headline: Albemarle Announces Enhanced Organizational Structure
summary: Albemarle Corporation (NYSE: ALB), a global leader in providing essential elements for mobility, energy, connectivity and health, today announced changes to its organizational structure to further align the company for agility and efficiency. These enhancements are designed to accelerate the company's market-led enterprise strategy and focus on operational excellence.

content.title: Albemarle Announces Enhanced Organizational Structure
content.summary: Albemarle Corporation (NYSE: ALB), a global leader in providing essential elements for mobility, energy, connectivity and health, today announced changes to its organizational structure to further align the company for agility and efficiency. These enhancements are designed to accelerate the company's market-led enterprise strategy and focus on operational excellence.

headline: Lithium stocks rally as CATL mine halt raises prospects of tighter supply
summary: During morning trade, Albemarle Corp jumped 10.2%, while Chile's Sociedad Quimica y Minera, rose 9.2% and Lithium Americas, gained 2.4%.  The most active lithium carbonate futures in Guangzhou rose the 8% daily limit after CATL said its mining license for the Yichun project in Jiangxi province expired on Aug. 9 and renewal was underway.

content.title: Lithium stocks rally as CATL mine halt raises prospects of tighter supply
content.summary: During morning trade, Albemarle Corp jumped 10.2%, while Chile's Sociedad Quimica y Minera, rose 9.2% and Lithium Americas, gained 2.4%.  The most active lithium carbonate futures in Guangzhou rose the 8% daily limit after CATL said its mining license for the Yichun project in Jiangxi province expired on Aug. 9 and renewal was underway.

thumbnail.caption: Bolivia inaugurates the Lithium Carbonate Industrial Plant, in the Salar de Uyuni

headline: Cannabis stocks, Avantor, Albemarle: Trending Tickers
summary: Cannabis stocks, such as Tilray (TLRY) and Amplify Alternative Harvest ETF (MJ), are climbing on Wall Street Journal reports that President Trump is considering reclassifying marijuana as a Schedule III drug. Avantor (AVTR) stock is gaining after activist investor Engine Capital disclosed a 3% stake in the company. Albemarle (ALB) stock is moving higher as Chinese battery producer Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. (300750.SZ) announced it will suspend lithium production at a key mine. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

content.title: Cannabis stocks, Avantor, Albemarle: Trending Tickers
content.description:
Cannabis stocks, such as Tilray (TLRY) and Amplify Alternative Harvest ETF (MJ), are climbing on Wall Street Journal reports that President Trump is considering reclassifying marijuana as a Schedule III drug.

Albemarle (ALB) stock is moving higher as Chinese battery producer Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. (300750.SZ) announced it will suspend lithium production at a key mine.

headline: Lithium Prices and Stocks Soar as Chinese Firm Suspends Major Mine's Operations
summary: Chinese battery manufacturer Contemporary Amperex Technology Co., or CATL, reportedly suspended operations at one of the world's largest lithium mines.

content.title: Lithium Prices and Stocks Soar as Chinese Firm Suspends Major Mine's Operations
content.summary: Chinese battery manufacturer Contemporary Amperex Technology Co., or CATL, reportedly suspended operations at one of the world's largest lithium mines.

thumbnail.caption: Gilles Sabrie / Bloomberg / Getty Images CATL's Jianxiawo lithium mine in Yichun, Jiangxi province is one of the word's largest.
